text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/517f00f78893087d2f9d45768a5ba4dc48cb6856|patch 8.2.0941: detecting terminal properties is unstructured>
patch 8.2.0941: detecting terminal properties is unstructured

Problem:    Detecting terminal properties is unstructured.
Solution:   Add a table with terminal properties.  Set properties when a
            terminal is detected.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0941: detecting terminal properties is unstructured · vim/vim@517f00f
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0941: detecting terminal properties is unstructured · vim/vim@517f00f
attachments.text: Problem: Detecting terminal properties is unstructured. Solution: Add a table with terminal properties. Set properties when a terminal is detected.

patch 8.2.0942: expanding to local dir after homedir keeps "~/"

Problem:    Expanding to local dir after homedir keeps "~/".
Solution:   Adjust modify_fname(). (Christian Brabandt, closes #6205,
            closes #5979)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/32ee627750e8b7b3fa6516b893e72f6e6af54710|patch 8.2.0943: displaying ^M or ^J depends on current buffer>
patch 8.2.0943: displaying ^M or ^J depends on current buffer

Problem:    Displaying ^M or ^J depends on current buffer.
Solution:   Pass the displayed buffer to transchar(). (closes #6225)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0943: displaying ^M or ^J depends on current buffer · vim/vim@32ee627
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0943: displaying ^M or ^J depends on current buffer · vim/vim@32ee627
attachments.text: Problem: Displaying ^M or ^J depends on current buffer. Solution: Pass the displayed buffer to transchar(). (closes #6225)

text:

patch 8.2.0944: xxd test leaves file behind

Problem:    Xxd test leaves file behind.
Solution:   Delete the file "XXDfile". (Christian Brabandt, closes #6228)

attachments.title: patch 8.2.0944: xxd test leaves file behind · vim/vim@253ea9f
attachments.text: Problem: Xxd test leaves file behind. Solution: Delete the file "XXDfile". (Christian Brabandt, closes #6228)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/152e79e94bb935e75b866bd55479648cde11066a|patch 8.2.0945: cannot use "z=" when 'spell' is off>
patch 8.2.0945: cannot use "z=" when 'spell' is off

Problem:    Cannot use "z=" when 'spell' is off.
Solution:   Make "z=" work even when 'spell' is off. (Christian Brabandt,
            Gary Johnson, closes #6227)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0945: cannot use "z=" when 'spell' is off · vim/vim@152e79e
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0945: cannot use "z=" when 'spell' is off · vim/vim@152e79e
attachments.text: Problem: Cannot use "z=" when 'spell' is off. Solution: Make "z=" work even when 'spell' is off. (Christian Brabandt, Gary Johnson, closes #6227)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/eebd555733491cb55b9f30fe28772c0fd0ebacf7|patch 8.2.0946: cannot use "q" to cancel a number prompt>
patch 8.2.0946: cannot use "q" to cancel a number prompt

Problem:    Cannot use "q" to cancel a number prompt.
Solution:   Recognize "q" instead of ignoring it.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0946: cannot use "q" to cancel a number prompt · vim/vim@eebd555
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0946: cannot use "q" to cancel a number prompt · vim/vim@eebd555
attachments.text: Problem: Cannot use "q" to cancel a number prompt. Solution: Recognize "q" instead of ignoring it.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/59de417b904bbd204e313f015839317b577bd124|patch 8.2.0938: NFA regexp uses tolower ()to compare ignore-case>
patch 8.2.0938: NFA regexp uses tolower ()to compare ignore-case

Problem:    NFA regexp uses tolower() to compare ignore-case. (Thayne McCombs)
Solution:   Use utf_fold() when possible. (ref. neovim #12456)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0938: NFA regexp uses tolower ()to compare ignore-case · vim/vim@59de417
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0938: NFA regexp uses tolower ()to compare ignore-case · vim/vim@59de417
attachments.text: Problem: NFA regexp uses tolower() to compare ignore-case. (Thayne McCombs) Solution: Use utf_fold() when possible. (ref. neovim #12456)
